Package org.consensusj.jsonrpc

Class AbstractRpcClient

java.lang.Object
org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AbstractRpcClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, AsyncSupport, JacksonRpcClient, JsonRpcClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
JsonRpcClientHttpUrlConnection, JsonRpcClientJavaNet
public abstract class AbstractRpcClient extends Object implements JacksonRpcClient
Abstract Base class for a strongly-typed, Jackson-based JSON-RPC client. Most of the work is done in default methods in JacksonRpcClient This abstract class implements the constructors, static fields, and getters, but leaves the core sendRequestForResponse method as abstract to be implemented by subclasses allowing implementation with alternative HTTP client libraries.

    • base64Encode

      protected static String base64Encode(String authString)
      Encode username password as Base64 for basic authentication

      We're using Base64, which requires Android 8.0 or later.

      Parameters:
      authString - An authorization string of the form `username:password`
      Returns:
      A compliant Base64 encoding of `authString`
